thread.title: ‘Jumanji’ Stays King of Weekend Box Office

author: wsjcom
title: ‘Jumanji’ Stays King of Weekend Box Office
text:
Meryl Streep, Liam Neeson, Taraji P. Henson and Paddington Bear all rushed into movie theaters over Martin Luther King Jr. weekend, but “Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle” still roared the loudest with an estimated $27 million in ticket sales, Friday to Sunday.
“Jumanji” easily remained the No. 1 film in North America despite an onslaught of new challengers, according to studio estimates Sunday. The Sony Pictures release is now approaching $300 million domestically and, after grossing $40 million in China this weekend, a world-wide...
